name: sandra beach
text: In our opinion, they provide the worst customer service. We pay $420 a month and you can’t get them to return your phone calls and emails.

resp.text: AMMCOR’s front desk and reception is live from 8:00 a.m. through 12:00 p.m. and 12:30 p.m. through 5:30 p.m., Monday-Thursday and 8:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m. on Friday.  In addition, AMMCOR also has an outside live Emergency Service available to all of our managed members 24/7 when the office is closed.  I am completely unaware of any phone calls not answered or not returned as we take pride in the additional expense of offering a live person to handle homeowner matters, rather than computer-generated answering and voice messaging.  Our Managers are required to respond to messages within 24 hours and their phones are monitored for compliance.   Please accept our apology if for some reason you felt you were not promptly and professionally served.  - AMMCOR

address: AMMCOR Management Company, Inc., 1211 Puerta Del Sol #120, San Clemente, CA 92673

name: Shahna Baig
text:
I've dealt with this property management company a couple of times for my rental home in Brea.  Not the best service, but fairly typical for any HOA.
But I just sold the home and was charged $950 to transfer to the new owners. TOTALLY RIDICULOUS.  That's unfairly gauging homeowners!  I made certain the escrow officer wasn't mistaking charging me that amount, but she assured me that this is what Ammcor charges. I'm very upset.
Advocate for your own HOA to go with a different company if they use Ammcor.

resp.text: Ms. Murphy's car was damaged during the night while parked in the HOA.  We contacted the private patrol service to obtain any information that they might have - they had no information on this incident.  We suggested that she contact the Sheriff to file a police report and her insurance company for the hit and run damage done to her vehicle.  Ms. Murphy seems to believe that the HOA and its management company are able to solve the problem with her damaged vehicle and unfortunately, this is a criminal matter and not an HOA matter.

I honestly thought Kim or any manicurist wouldn't be able to do it but it actually turned out better than the picture via a SNS natural dip. All designs were done free hand. It took 1 hour and 30 minutes. AMAZING!!

Luxe is the best salon i have gone to by far!

name: M G
text:
I just had the worst and most expensive  Mani-Pedi I ever had in Orange County. I am doing gel manicure and polish pedicure for 10 years now. I go to many different places and have paid many different prices for various quality of services. They are very expensive for the service. This place doesn't even do basic scrubing on their In and Out package! It is ridicules! The staff was unfriendly and snubish, the Gel manicure is bumpy on almost every nail. She didn't wash or wipe my hands after filing, my hands still feel powdery now, I am sitting in the car and writing this! She didn't use alcohol after the last gel lighting. She said she doesn't need to, time will tell how true that was.
Anyway, I am always fair on rating and always recommend services I like to others. But this place did a horrible job and I didn't like the arrogant attitude of the staff. Have had much better service for the same price,  including massages (arms and legs) and much nicer staff.
I don't know what the other raters are talking about by wine offered and so on! Nobody offered me anything! Not even water.
Other places serve you bottled water and cookies on the house at the same price!
Very disappointed customer here! Sorry!

resp.text: I'm so so SORRY when hearing that. If you can come back again, I promise serve you as the BEST as possible

name: Janet Irvin
text:
Very unpleasant. Could not get my x-rays, said they do not do digital. Imagine that in 2016. Said their lab went out of business. So that is now my problem. So she said for $100.00 they can get my x-rays. My doctor in San Clemente said a full set of x-rays is $140.00. Hello, do you think they are making money here. Most doctors charge $25.00 for copies of your x-rays.
My cleaning was she said ultarsonic, which I thought was nothing more than a water pic. I was sprayed on my clothes, face, and equipment. Very unsanitary. My teeth were never polished as in a normal cleaning. But oh, she informed me I got this for free. Excuse me, I pay on top of my medical an additional $240.00 a year for dental, vision, and exercise. Nothing is for free, and if this is the service you say is FREE, than I will continue to go to my private dentist and pay out of pocket. Plus I have worked my entire life from 16-66. I have paid into the system like every other hard working person in the U.S. It is terrible how senior citizens are treated later in life. And yes Dr. someday you will be in the same position I am in. and NO i would not recommend your services. Unhappy Patient.

text: TERRIBLE!!! Preferential treatment to some patients! I had an appointment at 1p I arrived 10 mins early and was not seen by the dentist until 1:45p. After 5 mins of waiting in the chair with blood in my mouth I decided to stand up and rinse my mouth. I've had teeth cleaning elsewhere where they were more thorough, but here the cleaning was possibly 5 minutes. And after the cleaning I asked the assistant if I could ask the Dentist some questions,  was asked to go to her at the front desk and I had to ask questions about my own X-rays because she failed to mention something until I asked more questions.

You stated that you have to be in 15 minutes, at 2pm at Applied Medical back at work as your lunch is over. You were offered to have another appointment for cleaning together with a filling and gum treatment. You chose to have a limited cleaning today.

name: Melissa Fraser
text:
I lost my personal insurance blue shield plan when Obamacare came in to play.
Since then, I have had to have medi-cal.
On 6/12 a family member called her dental office​ on my behalf (I couldn't speak I was in that much pain.)  I had a very infected molar & was in a LOT of pain. I couldn't believe it when they said to come in right away even with medi-cal! That's a dentist that cares!  Since having medi-cal for myself and young twins, I have never gotten such a rapid response for Doctors. I was literally immediately taken back once I arrived and very promptly taken care of.  I am still recovering from going in a couple days ago, my tooth indeed was very bad. Also, Dr. Taitz gave me antibiotics but also knew that I'd need a stronger pain reliever and prescribed a few days worth of norco as well. I don't like to take medicine unless I really need it....but boy I sure needed it.
My point is, she was courteous (her and the very sweet lady that works with her) completely shocked me by taking me right then and with medi-cal; and writing prescriptions she knew I would need when I went home to heal.
I will return to her and refer her simply because of what she did for me. She didn't know me from Adam. She went above and beyond and located right down the street from my home.  In & out fast. I'm hoping my mouth finishes its' healing this weekend.
**Very grateful and thankful to this office**
address: Taitz Orly DDS, 29839 Santa Margarita Pkwy, Rancho Santa Margarita, CA 92688

resp.text: Thank you Misty! Here is to many more years doing your ‘Do’!

text: Love this place. It's a little set back from the road, so don't miss it - it's upstairs in the shopping precinct and if you're driving they validate parking in the lot. Bring yourself, ask for Sandra - book ahead since they get busy and walk-ins aren't always guaranteed.

name: Melanie Metzman
text:
Daniella is an artist when it comes to hair.

I came in in desperate need of a haircut and with my blond hair basically being two different blocks of color (it looked awful). Daniella sat me down and we talked about what I wanted, went through photos, and walked me through every option to get the results I wanted to achieve.

I honestly couldn't be more happy with the results. My highlights/lowlights look amazing, and because of the haircut my hair actually has LIFE now. I actually look forward to doing my hair every morning! All thanks to Daniella.

Lastly, it's a joy to come to the salon. Daniella has done an amazing job decorating the place and making you feel comfortable and relaxed in the space.

I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Multiple of my friends have complimented me on my new hair, and I'm telling all of them to go to Daniella. Trust me you won't regret it.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Melanie! We're so happy you love your hair!

address: Widows Peak Salon, 970 N Broadway Suite 214A, Los Angeles, CA 90012

name: Tiffany Szpylman
text: Daniella is truly amazing. Not only is she great to hang and talk with - her hair talents are out of this world! She really listened to my vision and did everything possible to bring it to life. The end results were even better than I hoped for! Not to mention the salon is adorable. AND there's a convenient parking garage downstairs as well as a great coffee shop! This is my favorite hair salon in LA by far  We went through correcting, extensions, highlights, toners and lots of espresso to achieve this dreamy beachy look and I couldn't be happier.

resp.text: You're the best, Tiffany! Thank you for the wonderful review!

address: Widows Peak Salon, 970 N Broadway Suite 214A, Los Angeles, CA 90012

name: Kasia Adamczyk
text: Very slow when it comes to upgrading to express shipping/changing orders because of out of stock items but in the end, the customer received it by specific day they wanted and they really loved the shirts so I am changing my review from 1 to 4 because they did a good job!
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Classic Print Company
text:
Ordered shirts - I was not given a ship option- I called & emailed and offered to let them use my UPS 3 DAY ship. And needless to say my 40 pieces did not arrive, they were due 2 days ago. My package has been held up in Atlanta now for 6  days just sitting there. I called Print Partners/Dream Junction on wednesday told them I had to have my items by Friday which was pushing it, Spoke with a Andrew told him - Please just reprint my order and ship it out 2 day air so i can have it here by Friday - He said No just wait on your package itll be there. Today is Friday and No Package. Luckily we ordered back up shirts and we used transfers to print our clients shirts. THE BAD THING IS today when I contacted them for a REFUND they refuse to issue a refund and they could have avoided this review and many others. I cant believe they refused to give a refund ! SO BAD on so many levels.
Look out for The Dream Junction dba/ Print Partners. They dont stand behind their work or clients. The Pictures below are of us printing our own shirts that were due 2 days ago. We used heat transfers to get the job done .
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Two Bays
text: Awful production times create angry customers. Do not recommend. If you use Printify, beware of your order getting rerouted to them.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: KM Collectible
text: Awful quality prints. I get so many complaints from customers that ink gets faded so bad. Slow shipping too. It makes no sense why they don't ship USPS direct but instead use this slow bulk shipping company called One Stop Mailing. You're gonna get lots of complaints daily and you will lose money dealing with these guys. It's a headache. You've been warned.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Care Barrett
text:
Ordered a sample through my Printify account, and for their shipping and quality it's worth the price so far. I think It'd come a couple days late (But July 4th fell before my delivery date.) and I Live in Vancouver BC, Canada so the little extra for shipping, and a different shipping service used is the reason it was on time?

Started my shop with them on Etsy, and now have a domain. (CultXLV)
So we'll see what customer have to say.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Skylar Chaput
text: The dream junction is fantastic! I’ve gotten work done through them for a number of things. Quality has always been high, & customer service has been second to none. Great people working there too - so friendly!
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Paws N Friends
text: All of our orders took so long to be fulfilled and shipped out. When they started arriving one of our customers was sent the wrong item, it wasn't even our design.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Mark Roberts
text: Don't be fooled by Dream Junction better prices. Their service is so bad, it is not worth doing business with them. They can take forever to print a shirt and never let you know there is a delay unless you ask after waiting 8 days. Find somewhere else for you printing needs.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: The Kingston and Channing Show
text: Horrible, Horrible, HORRIBLE!! They do not honor the 3-4 day print turnover. I’ve ordered from them before (1 sweatshirt) & it took customer 2 months to get it. That was over the summer. Decided to try them again for Christmas sweatshirts by I was like they can’t be that horrible again especially during the holidays. WHELP! I was wrong. Had 2 orders made for customers, 1 on the 6 & the other on the 10th. Neither order has been printed or shipped just picked and I was involved yesterday after 14 days that 2 were out of stock after it was stated that the sweatshirts had been picked. They are HORRIBLE to use for business.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Pay Laker
text: I have been trying to contact them for months with no response. I need my W-2 plz. Everyone out here with all this stimulas money and I can't get mine cuz they won't send me my w2
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Davey Sprockets
text: Buyers beware!   Their website boasts MASSIVE production with top-of-the-line equipment.  We've had an order of 27 tee-shirts in production since October 4th.  All 27 tee-shirts have the same exact design on them.  This is the 13th business day of production on this order, so they can't even do 2 shirts per day.  The production time guarantee is only good for  less than 12 shirts, so if you have a "bulk" order, put in separate orders of 11 shirts per order to save this hassle.  (just don't buy from dream junction)  That's what I would have done if I would have known they were going to take so long.  As of now, day 13 and my order still has not shipped to my customer.  I'm curious to see if the print quality is any good.  Considering it has taken so long for them to be made, they should be pristine.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Aisha “TAYLORmade” T.
text: Wow!  I really wish I had checked these reviews before choosing them as my printer on Printify.  I've already had to report 4 orders where the print quality was absolutely terrible and looked nothing like the design.  Most recently, they sent a customer the completely wrong item!!   It was a design that isn't even in my store!!  And yes, the production times are way too long!  I'm not sure why Printify continues to work with them because they are terrible.  I am now in the process of switching ALL of my designs to a different printer.  Totally unacceptable!!
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

text: 5 day’s in production the customer definitely not gettin it til after Christmas

name: Riding Updrafts
text: Prinitfy users beware! I was so excited to have a printing aggregater for my designs, and I was impressed with the machines used at The Dream Junction when I looked up their facilities. One wash. One wash and my design  was destroyed. Cold water, low heat, ultra protective wash. I called the facility itself and left a message asking to be called back and my issue at hand. No returned call. I'd attach a photo but I was so upset by the insult of a print that I threw it away before leaving a review occurred to me. 9.9 rating on Printify. Unacceptable. One star.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: money maker
text: Order from printify, so many orders pile up still in production for more than two weeks! BEST SERVICE THAT I'VE EVER GET!! Fvck
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704

name: Work Zone Fitness
text: Overall the quality of the shirts are good. I've only had a few misprints. On the other hand, their production times are horribly inconsistent. I've got some shirts that are printed within 4 hours, and others that take DAYS to get done. If you can find somewhere with better and more consistent printing times I suggest switching.
address: The Dream Junction, 1915 S Susan St, Santa Ana, CA 92704
